string.value: Something bad seems to have happened to #p9000079#, a tourist who is sightseeing in the #b#m950100000##k. Talk to #b#p9000079##k.

#p9000079# was upset that a huge #r#o9500384##k stole her cell phones and cameras. Recover #p9000079#'s lost #bCell Phones#k and #bCameras#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. 

#i4032602# #t4032602# #b#c4032602# / 5#k
#i4032603# #t4032603# #b#c4032603# / 5#k

#p9000079# would like to thank you for recovering her items and requests your help in the future if she happens to lose something again. She says she often loses things, so go see her again #bin 1 hour#k.

Argh, I've traveled such a great distance to get here, but now I won't even be able to call anyone or take any pictures! ...Oh, hello. Are you also here to tour the #m950100000#? Then you should be careful of the big monkeys! They stole my personal items!

There was a #o9500384# carrying a baby on her back, so I tried to take a picture of her. Then suddenly, she grabbed my camera! I was in the middle of calling management when the monkey grabbed my cell phone as well! What a crazy monkey! Oh, my cell phone and my camera... I wish I could get those items back.

What? You'll retrieve my cell phone and camera for me? Well, I'd suggest you beware of the monkeys, who look pretty strong... Well, if you're serious, can you talk to #b#p9000080##k to enter the Monkey Garden and recover #b5 cell phones#k and #b5 cameras#k for me?
Why do I carry five of each? Well, isn't that normal nowadays? You seem so surprised!
Aww, great. You won't help. And the manager, who said he'd help, claims that it's my fault and that he can't do anything about it. How two-faced! What should I do now?
Hey, that's it! Those are my cell phones and cameras! Wow, you really did it! Now, say cheese!

Well, I'd really like to continue my tour, but I'm clumsy about my belongings and I worry about the monkeys. I have a feeling they will try to steal my things again if I tour the place for #b1 more hour#k.
I guess you haven't found my #bcell phones#k and #bcameras#k yet. There are #b5#k of each. You can find the #r#o9500384#s#k that stole them by talking to #b#p9000080## and entering the Monkey Garden.
